languages.text: Лишь почтенные и великолепно оборудованные храмы Механикус получают право стать капеллами исчисления. Под величественными сводами кибертеурги заклинают разрушительных цифровых ракшасов, а инфокузнецы пробуждают духов благословенных когитаторов в вычислительных литургиях и лекс-молитвах.

traits.locale_text: Сотворение реликварного инфостанка (data loom), мега-когитатора размером с девятиэтажку, выполняющего на порядок более священные вычисления.

languages.text: Only the revered and marvellously equipped temples of the Adeptus Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.
languages.original_text: Лишь почтенные и великолепно оборудованные храмы Механикус получают право стать капеллами исчисления. Под величественными сводами кибертеурги заклинают разрушительных цифровых ракшасов, а инфокузнецы пробуждают духов благословенных когитаторов в вычислительных литургиях и лекс-молитвах.

traits.locale_text: Only the revered and marvelously equipped temples of the Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.

Only the revered and marvelously equipped temples of the Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.

Only the revered and marvellously equipped temples of the Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.

Only the revered and marvellously equipped temples of the Adeptus Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.

Only the revered and marvellously equipped temples of the Adeptus Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.

languages.text: Solo los templos más respetados y mejor equipados del Adeptus Mechanicus pueden ganarse el derecho de servir como capillas de la enumeración. Bajo sus majestuosas cámaras, los ciberteúrgos exorcizan devastadores rakshas digitales mientras que los datartífices despiertan el espíritu de los benditos cogitadores mediante liturgias aritméticas y lexplegarias.
languages.original_text: Only the revered and marvellously equipped temples of the Adeptus Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.

traits.locale_text: Solo los templos más respetados y mejor equipados del Adeptus Mechanicus pueden ganarse el derecho de servir como capillas de la enumeración. Bajo sus majestuosas cámaras, los ciberteúrgos exorcizan devastadores rakshas digitales mientras que los datartífices despiertan el espíritu de los benditos cogitadores mediante liturgias aritméticas y lexplegarias.

languages.text: Seuls les temples révérés et fastueusement équipés de l'Adeptus Mechanicus peuvent prétendre à l'honneur de devenir des Chapelles de l'Énumération. Sous leurs voûtes majestueuses, les cyberthéurges exorcisent des rakshas numériques destructeurs, tandis que les compilateurs réveillent les esprits des cogitateurs sacrés à l'aide de liturgies arithmétiques et de lexprières.
languages.original_text: Only the revered and marvellously equipped temples of the Adeptus Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.

traits.locale_text: Seuls les temples révérés et fastueusement équipés de l'Adeptus Mechanicus peuvent prétendre à l'honneur de devenir des Chapelles de l'Énumération. Sous leurs voûtes majestueuses, les cyberthéurges exorcisent des rakshas numériques destructeurs, tandis que les compilateurs réveillent les esprits des cogitateurs sacrés à l'aide de liturgies arithmétiques et de lexprières.

languages.text: 只有备受尊崇、装备精良的机械修会神殿，才有资格被改造为计数礼拜堂。在雄伟的拱顶下，智控术师负责不断造成破坏的数字恶灵，而数据技师则会通过尊贵的算法祭仪与思律祷文，唤醒受祝福的沉思者机魂。
languages.original_text: Only the revered and marvellously equipped temples of the Adeptus Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.

traits.locale_text: 只有备受尊崇、装备精良的机械修会神殿，才有资格被改造为计数礼拜堂。在雄伟的拱顶下，智控术师负责不断造成破坏的数字恶灵，而数据技师则会通过尊贵的算法祭仪与思律祷文，唤醒受祝福的沉思者机魂。

languages.text: 帝国宗務局の神殿の中で、崇敬を集め、素晴らしい設備を備えたものだけが、「目録の礼拝堂」となる権利を得る。その荘厳な丸天井の下では、サイバーシアージたちが破滅をもたらすデジタル・ラクシャを祓い、データスミスたちが算術の典礼と法祈祷師によって祝福された考算機ーたちの精霊を目覚めさせるのだ。
languages.original_text: Only the revered and marvellously equipped temples of the Adeptus Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.

traits.locale_text: 帝国宗務局の神殿の中で、崇敬を集め、素晴らしい設備を備えたものだけが、「目録の礼拝堂」となる権利を得る。その荘厳な丸天井の下では、サイバーシアージたちが破滅をもたらすデジタル・ラクシャを祓い、データスミスたちが算術の典礼と法祈祷師によって祝福された考算機ーたちの精霊を目覚めさせるのだ。

languages.text: Nur die verehrten und wundersam ausgerüsteten Tempel des Adeptus Mechanicus verdienen sich das Recht, zu Kapellen der Zählung zu werden. Unter ihren majestätischen Gewölben führen Cybertheurgen Exorzismen an verheerenden digitalen Rakshas durch, während Datenschmiede durch arithmetische Liturgien und Lexgebete die Geister der gesegneten Cogitatoren erwecken.
languages.original_text: Only the revered and marvellously equipped temples of the Adeptus Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.

traits.locale_text: Nur die verehrten und wundersam ausgerüsteten Tempel des Mechanicus verdienen sich das Recht, zu Kapellen der Zählung zu werden. Unter ihren majestätischen Gewölben führen Cybertheurgen Exorzismen an verheerenden digitalen Rakshas durch, während Datenschmiede durch arithmetische Liturgien und Lexgebete die Geister der gesegneten Cogitatoren erwecken.

Nur die verehrten und wundersam ausgerüsteten Tempel des Mechanicus verdienen sich das Recht, zu Kapellen der Zählung zu werden. Unter ihren majestätischen Gewölben führen Cybertheurgen Exorzismen an verheerenden digitalen Rakshas durch, während Datenschmiede durch arithmetische Liturgien und Lexgebete die Geister der gesegneten Cogitatoren erwecken.

languages.text: Sayım Şapeli olma şerefine yalnızca Adeptus Mechanicus'un saygın ve müthiş donanımlı tapınakları erebilir. Siberafsuncular, heybetli kasa dairelerinin altında yıkım getiren dijital ayinler yürütürken veri ustaları da aritmetik dualar ve lexyakarışlarıyla mukaddes kavramsayarların ruhlarını uyandırır.
languages.original_text: Only the revered and marvellously equipped temples of the Adeptus Mechanicus earn the right to become Chapels of Enumeration. Underneath their majestic vaults, cybertheurges exorcise devastation-wreaking digital rakshas, while datasmiths awaken the spirits of the blessed cogitators with arithmetical liturgies and lexprayers.
